name: Light Hunter
description:
Light Hunter is a local multiplayer action and strategy game, top-down escape type, where players are challenged to race against time and collect as many "flame points" (energy) to be able to open the single door and leave the room before an invisible creature represented by sound effects reaches the players.

Equipe:

  • Tatyane Calixto - Programmer
  •  Amanda Calixto - Game Artist and Animation 2D
  • Paloma Silva - Game Designer
  • Emmanuel Peixoto - Sound Designer
  • Carol Crivelin - Animation 2D
